Verses: 1 karththar Ennai Nokki: Moseyum Saamuvelum En Mugaththukku Munbaaga Nindraalum, En Manam Indha Janangal Patchamaai Saaraadhu, Ivargal En Mugaththaivittup Purappattuppogumpadi Ivargalaith Thuraththividu,

2 enge Purappattuppovom Endru Ivargal Unnaik Kettaal, Nee Avargalai Nokki: Saavukku Edhuvaanavargal Saavukkum, Pattayaththukku Edhuvaanavargal Pattayaththukkum, Panjaththukku Edhuvaanavargal Panjaththukkum, Siraiyiruppukku Edhuvaanavargal Siraiyiruppukkum Neraaip Pogavendum Endru Karththaruraikkiraar Endru Sollu.

3 kondrupodap Pattayamum, Pidiththu Izhukka Naaigalum, Patchiththu Azhikka Aagaayaththup Paravaigalum, Boomiyin Mirugangalum Aagiya Naanguvidhamaana Vaadhaigalai Naan Avargalmel Varak Kattalaiyiduven Endru Karththar Sollugiraar.
4 esekkiyaavin Kumaaranum, Yoodhaavin Raajaavumaagiya Manaase Erusalemil Seydhavaigalinimiththam Avargalai Boomiyilulla Ellaa Raajyangalilum Alaiyappannuven.
5 erusaleme, Yaar Unmel Iranguvaargal? Yaar Unmel Paridhabippaargal? Yaar Unnidaththirkuth Thirumbi, Un Sugaseydhiyai Visaarippaargal?
6 nee Ennaivittup Pinvaangipponaai, Aagaiyaal En Kaiyai Unakku Virodhamaai Neetti, Unnai Azhippen; Naan Poruththup Poruththu Ilaiththupponen Endru Karththar Sollugiraar.
7 dhesaththin Vaasalgalil Avargalaith Thootrukkoodaiyaal Thootrippoduven; En Janangal Thangal Vazhigalaivittuth Thirumbaadhapadiyinaal Naan Avargalaip Pillaigal Atravargalaakki Azhippen.

8 kadarkarai Manalaippaarkkilum Adhiga Vidhavaigal Avargalil Undaayiruppaargal; Pattappagalile Paazhaakkugiravanaith Thaayinmelum Pillaigalinmelum Varappannuven; Avargalmel Pattanaththin Kalagaththaiyum, Bayangarangalaiyum Vizhappannuven.

9 ezhu Pillaigalaip Petraval Kalaiththuppogiraal; Aval Than Praananai Vittuvittaal; Innum Pagalaayirukkaiyil Avaludaiya Sooriyan Asthamiththadhu; Vetkamum Lachchaiyum Adaindhaal; Avargalil Meedhiyaagiravargalaiyo Avargaludaiya Saththurukkalukku Munbaagap Pattayaththukku Oppukkoduppen Endru Karththar Sollugiraar.

10 en Thaaye, Dhesaththukkellaam Vazhakkukkum Vaadhukkum Ullaanavanaayirukkumpadi Ennai Nee Petraaye; Aiyo! Naan Avargalukku Vattikkuk Koduththadhumillai, Avargal Enakku Vattikkuk Koduththadhumillai; Aanaalum, Ellaarum Ennai Sabikkiraargal.
11 unnil Meedhiyaayiruppavargal Nanmaiyadaivaargal; Theengin Kaalaththilum Nerukkaththin Kaalaththilum Unakkaaga Naan Saththuruvukku Edhirppattu, Unakku Sagaayancheyven Endru Meyyaaga Sollugiren.
12 vadakkeyirundhu Varum Irumbaiyum Vengalaththaiyum Irumbu Norukkumo?
13 unnudaiya Ellaap Paavangalinimiththamum, Unnudaiya Ellaa Ellaigalilum, Naan Un Aasthiyaiyum, Un Pokkishangalaiyum Kirayamillaamal Sooraiyiduvippen.
14 nee Ariyaadha Dhesaththil Un Saththurukkal Vasamaaga Naan Unnaith Thaandippogap Pannuven; Ungalmel Eriyappogira Akkini En Kobaththile Moondadhu Endru Karththar Sonnaar.

15 karththaave, Neer Adhai Ariveer; Dhevareer Ennai Ninaiththu Ennai Visaariththu, Ennaith Thunbappaduththugiravargalukku Ennimiththam Needhiyai Sarikkattum; Ummudaiya Neediyaporumaiyinimiththam Ennai Vaarikkollaadhirum; Naan Ummudaiya Nimiththam Nindhaiyai Sagikkiren Endru Ariyum.

16 ummudaiya Vaarththaigal Kidaiththavudane Avaigalai Utkonden; Ummudaiya Vaarththaigal Enakku Sandhoshamum, En Irudhayaththukku Magizhchchiyumaayirundhadhu; Senaigalin Dhevanaagiya Karththaave, Ummudaiya Naamam Enakkuth Tharikkappattirukkiradhu.
17 naan Pariyaasakkaararudaiya Koottaththil Utkaarndhu Kalikoorndhadhillai; Umadhu Karaththinimiththam Thaniththu Utkaarndhen; Salippinaal Ennai Nirappineer.
18 en Novu Niththiyakaalamaagavum En Kaayam Aaraadha Kodiya Punnaagavum Iruppaanen? Neer Enakku Nambappadaadha Ootraippolavum, Vatrippogira Jalaththaippolavum Iruppeero?

19 idhinimiththam Nee Thirumbinaal Naan Unnaith Thirumba Seerppaduththuven; En Mugaththukkumunbaaga Nilaiththumiruppaai; Nee Theezhppaanadhinindru Vilaiyerappetradhaip Piriththeduththaal, En Vaaipoliruppaai; Nee Avargalidaththil Thirumbaamal, Avargal Unnidaththil Thirumbuvaargalaaga Endru Karththarsollugiraar.

20 unnai Indha Janaththukku Edhire Aranaana Vengala Alangamaakkuven; Avargal Unakku Virodhamaaga Yuththampannuvaargal, Aanaalum Unnai Merkollamaattaargal; Unnai Ratchippadharkaagavum, Unnaith Thappuvippadharkaagavum Naan Unnudane Irukkiren Endru Karththar Sollugiraar.
21 naan Unnaip Pollaadhavargalin Kaikkuth Thappuviththu, Unnai Balavandharin Kaikku Neengalaakki Viduvippen Engiraar.
